resources:
AustinAllergyAlert Settings> Calendar About Contact Tree Mold Grass Weed Rate the severity of your allergy symptoms Sorry, no information currently available. Push Notifications Edit Push Notifications: Push Notification Summary Do you want to delete this note? Yes No Allergen counts are taken from allergistsofaustin.com

Counts are typically reported Monday-Friday, excluding holidays.

Allergen levels are decided as follows:

MOLDS
	0-299 Low
	300-999 Medium
	1,000-9,999 High
	10,000+ Very High

GRASSES
	0-4 Low
	5-19 Medium
	20-199 High
	200+ Very High

TREES
	0-14 Low
	15-89 Medium
	90-1,499 High
	1,500+ Very High

WEEDS
	0-9 Low
	10-49 Medium
	50 499 High
	500+ Very High

OTHER
	0-9 Low
	10-99 Medium
	100-999 High
	1,000+ Very High

@string/tree
@string/mold
@string/grass
@string/weed
